articles.title: Which foods do you eat together? How you combine them may raise dementia risk: Study finds 'food networks' centered on processed meats, starches may raise risk - Science Daily
articles.description: It's no secret that a healthy diet may benefit the brain. However, it may not only be what foods you eat, but what foods you eat together that may be associated with your risk of dementia, according to a new study.
articles.content: It's no secret that a healthy diet may benefit the brain. However, it may not only be what foods you eat, but what foods you eat together that may be associated with your risk of dementia, according to a new study published in the April 22, 2020, online issue… [+3589 chars]
